title.narrative: Countries enabled to strengthen their health systems to address population-specific health needs and barriers to equity across the life course

description.narrative: Improved access to quality essential health services

Integrated, people-centred service delivery systems; patient and health worker safety; quality of services; life course (newborn, child, adolescent, sexual and reproductive health, maternal, ageing and persons with disabilities); vaccines (incl. measles and rubella elimination, hepatitis B control, cervical cancer, and maternal and neonatal tetanus elimination).

mailing-address.narrative: Indraprastha Estate, Mahatma Gandhi Marg, New Delhi 110 002, India

title.narrative: Triple billion targets - tracking the work of WHO, countries, regions and partners to meet the Triple Billion targets and health-related Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)
WHO Mid-term Results Report - Programme Budget 2020-2021
